p: This crate is based on macroquad_grid. Documentation currently only as comments in the code.
All pages listed here are incomplete and (probably) rarely updated!
Examples can be run via the cargo run --release --example {EXNM} command.
Basic 10x10 grid of squares with showcase of inside text, gap coloring and selection.
Basically the same as simple_square but with Hexagons. Hexagons are pointy, not flat!
